title: Celtic gold in Ireland
creator_credit: National Museum of Ireland, Rex Roberts and John Fitzmaurice Mills
brief_description: Shows some fine examples of prehistoric Celtic gold work, jewellery and other ornamental pieces, housed in the National Museum. The film also shows some of the places of historical interest where they were found in rural Ireland.
creator_credit_for_label: National Museum of Ireland, Rex Roberts and John Fitzmaurice Mills
description: Shows some fine examples of prehistoric Celtic gold work, jewellery and other ornamental pieces, housed in the National Museum. The film also shows some of the places of historical interest where they were found in rural Ireland.
